#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

const long double pi = 3.14159265358979323846264338328;

int main(){
    int t;
    cin >> t;
    while(t--){
        long double r1,h1,r2,h2;
        cin >> r1 >> h1 >> r2 >> h2;
        long double ar1 = (pi*r1*r1*h1/3) + (2*pi*r1*r1*r1/3);
        long double ar2 = pi*r2*r2*h2;
        cout << setprecision(20) <<ar1 << " " << ar2 << endl;
    }
}
